module.name: opcManager
module.description: Module to handle the gestion of 2 OPC's: one real and one Mental
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Module to handle the gestion of two differents OPC's. One is real and plugged on real sensors, the other one is Mental. The goal of this module is to manipulate the content of the Mental OPC, according to the will of the user, mainly with the use of the ABM.

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
Name of the real OPC (the one plugged on the sensors)

input.description: RPC port of the module, main input. Get the external commands

output.description: Port to abmReasoning. Query information about the knwoledge of the robot. To be connected to "/abmReasoning/rpc".
